The rumors about the National Rifle Asso: indicating that the claim about the Republican Party declaring their national convention to be a "gun-free zone" may also be false.
The article by Occupy Democrats: which reported the claim about the Republican Party's declaration, did not provide any other information or evidence to support the claim.
The fact that the Secret Service: responsible for security at the convention, may have ordered the prohibition of guns at the event does not necessarily indicate hypocrisy on the part of the Republican Party.
The existence of a petition signed by 55: 000 supporters demanding the right to bear arms at the convention does suggest that some individuals perceive a contradiction between the Republican Party's stance on gun rights and the gun-free policy at their own event.
